55f2d3fd4bdc2d5f408b4567 Description:
[Factory, 팩토리]
16호 화학공장의 산업 단지 및 설비는 테라그룹(TerraGroup)이 불법으로 임대했던 장소입니다. USEC과 BEAR는 타르코프 산업단지의 통제권을 얻고자 했었고, Contract Wars 기간 동안에 공장 부지에서 수많은 총격전을 벌였습니다.

혼란이 가시고 난 뒤, 공장 시설은 남아있는 민간인, 스캐브, 낙오된 군인, 그리고 남아있는 USEC과 BEAR들이 포함된 여러 무장세력들의 피난처로 변했습니다.
56db0b3bd2720bb0678b4567 Description:
[Arena]
타르코프에 남아있는 주민들이 투사들의 싸움을 위해 이퀘이터-2 쇼핑몰을 재설계해서 만든 임시 경기장입니다.
56f40101d2720b2a4d8b45d6 Description:
[Customs, 커스텀즈]
공장(Factory)에 인접한 산업단지의 일부분에 해당하는 지역입니다. 세관 터미널, 기숙사, 연료유 저장시설과 그 외 기타 시설들이 이곳에 위치해 있습니다.
5704e3c2d2720bac5b8b4567 Description:
[Woods, 우드]
프리오제르스크(Priozersk) 자연보호 구역은 최근 북서부 연방지구의 야생생물 보존 지역 목록에 포함되었습니다.
5704e47ed2720bb35b8b4568 Description:
[Town, 타운]
해변가에 위치한 작은 마을인 베르크네이(Verkhneye)는 아름다운 정원과 야외활동하기 좋은 장소가 있어 지역 주민들이 선호하는 곳입니다.
5704e4dad2720bb55b8b4567 Description:
[Lighthouse, 라이트하우스]
달니 곶(Cape Dalniy)에 위치한 등대(Lighthouse)는 타르코프로 들어가는 길목의 전략적 요충지였습니다. Contract Wars 당시에는 USEC의 주요 진입 지점이자 작전기지로 사용되기도 했습니다. 분쟁 이후에는, 타르코프에 남아 자신들만의 질서를 확립하기로 결정했던 등대의 옛 주인들이 다시 등대로 돌아오기 전까지 스캐브들이 이 장소를 애용했습니다.
5704e554d2720bac5b8b456e Description:
[Shoreline, 쇼어라인]
해안선(Shoreline)은 항만 지역에 인접한 타르코프 교외의 주요 지역입니다.

이 지역 내에는 부분적으로 버려진 마을, 현대식 개인 주택과 농경지, 요트 관련 시설이 있는 긴 해안선, 주유소, 기상 관측소, 휴대전화 기지국 등의 시설이 들어서 있습니다. 
그중에서도 가장 눈길을 끄는 것은 독자적인 수력 발전 시설과 복수의 건물로 구성된 "Azure Coast"라는 이름의 휴양지입니다. 이 휴양지는 과거 타르코프 항을 이용해 탈출을 준비하던 테라그룹(TerraGroup) 직원 및 그 관계자들의 임시 숙박 시설로 사용되었습니다.
5704e5a4d2720bb45b8b4567 Description:
[Terminal]
항구 지역의 큰 구역으로, 러시아 연방 비상 대책 위원회(EmerCom)의 예비 탈출 지점이라는 소문이 있습니다.
5704e5fad2720bc05b8b4567 Description:
[Reserve]
도시 전설에 따르면, 연방 준비 기관(Federal State Reserve Agency)의 비밀기지는 전면적인 핵전쟁을 충분히 견딜 수 있을 만큼, 많은 식량, 의약품 및 기타 자원을 보유하고 있다고 합니다.
5704e64ad2720bb55b8b456e Description:
[Private Sector, 프라이빗 섹터]
타르코프의 상류층을 위한 개인 주택 지구입니다. 분쟁 발생 직후 첫 몇 주 동안은 난민 캠프로 쓰였지만, 그 후에는 도적이 출몰하는 곳이 되었습니다.
5714dbc024597771384a510d Description:
[Interchange, 나들목]
타르코프 교통 시스템에 핵심 역할을 하는 남쪽 인터체인지(Interchange)입니다. 이곳은 항구지역과 타르코프 외곽의 산업지구를 연결해 주는 전략적 요충지입니다. 이곳에는 비상위원회(EMERCOM)가 퇴각 작전을 진행할 때 본거지로 활용하던 대형 쇼핑몰 'ULTRA'가 있습니다.
5714dc342459777137212e0b Description:
[Suburbs, 서버브즈]
길고 행복한 삶을 위한 모든 기반시설과 편의시설이 있는 타르코프의 교외 및 통근 지역입니다.
5714dc692459777137212e12 Description:
[Streets of Tarkov, 스트리트 오브 타르코프]
타르코프 시내에는 은행, 쇼핑몰, 호텔뿐만 아니라 번영하고 있는 대도시에 필요한 모든 편의 시설들이 있습니다.
599319c986f7740dca3070a6 Description:
[Arena]
타르코프에 남아있는 주민들이 투사들의 싸움을 위해 Equator-2 쇼핑몰을 재설계해서 만든 임시 경기장입니다.
59fc81d786f774390775787e Description:
[Factory, 팩토리]
16호 화학공장의 산업 단지 및 설비는 테라그룹(TerraGroup)이 불법으로 임대했던 장소입니다. USEC과 BEAR는 타르코프 산업단지의 통제권을 얻고자 했었고, Contract Wars 기간 동안에 공장 부지에서 수많은 총격전을 벌였습니다.

혼란이 가시고 난 뒤, 공장 시설은 남아있는 민간인, 스캐브, 낙오된 군인, 그리고 남아있는 USEC과 BEAR들이 포함된 여러 무장세력들의 피난처로 변했습니다.
5b0fc42d86f7744a585f9105 Description:
[The Lab, 랩]
지하 연구소 단지 '테라그룹 연구소'는 타르코프 중심가 바로 밑에 있는 숨겨진 장소입니다. 공식적으로 이 연구소는 존재하지 않는 곳입니다. 여러 자료들을 참고한 바에 의하면 화학, 물리학, 생물학 그리고 첨단 기술 분야의 연구 및 개발, 테스트, 시뮬레이션 프로젝트를 진행했었습니다.
61e800b841ee214fbf1f0e53 Description:
[Air Pit]
버려진 터미널 격납고, 죽음의 경기장들 중 하나로 만들기 위해 지역주민들에게 빌렸습니다.
621df90bf200a905ed57d31d Description:
[Equator]
타르코프에 남아있는 주민들이 투사들의 싸움을 위해 이퀘이터-2 쇼핑몰을 재설계해서 만든 임시 경기장입니다.
62a05c960a18b50b7c575b1b Description:
[Bay 5]
과거에 테라그룹 연구소가 보호했었던 항구 지역의 화물 보관 구역입니다.
62a20c387949e8388b2f97c8 Description:
[Sawmill]
도시와 교외 사이에 위치한 오래된 개인 제재소입니다. 테라그룹 연구소의 자율 통제 시스템이 갖춰진 예비 비밀 지휘소라는 소문이 있습니다.
62eba95b7ba21c1d534d305a Description:
[Bowl]
관중석이 있는 오래된 스포츠 경기장이 죽음의 결투장으로 개조되었습니다.
6441004f8ab20b218807f14b Description: A car chop shop on the outskirts of Tarkov. It used to be a place where stolen cars were dismantled for parts, but now it's used to host firefights.
64b7d7f23d81c8a9ee03ac27 Description: A courtyard in one of residential neighborhoods, equipped by the Host for Arena fights.
653e6760052c01c1c805532f Description:
[Ground Zero]
타르코프의 상업 중심지입니다. 테라그룹의 본사가 있었던 장소로, 모든 것이 여기서 시작되었습니다.
65b8d6f5cdde2479cb2a3125 Description: The business center of Tarkov. This is where TerraGroup was headquartered. This is where it all began. The area has yet again become a hot zone since the early days of the conflict.
65cc8f81a9aac3e77d0cfd3e Description: The southern port Terminal has been under Russian Armed Forces control since the beginning of the Tarkov conflict. After the city was sealed off, the terminal was fortified and became the primary evacuation point, sought by both civilian refugees and PMC units. According to unconfirmed reports, TerraGroup personnel were also evacuated through this port.
662b728d328cb632bd0c6caf Description: The railway station, whose trains connected Tarkov with other cities in the Norvinsk region, was opened after reconstruction on the eve of the conflict. It is now used as an arena for battles.
6690e7e7dc976e4c780336b1 Description: A 19th century sea fort, which by fate became a prison at first and then after a century got turned into an arena for gladiatorial fights.
6733700029c367a3d40b02af Description: A facility of one of TerraGroup's contractors, Knossos LLC. According to public sources, they build amusement and theme parks. However, this place looks more like a heavily fortified bunker than a new theme park.
68236e8153654e8c1200798a Description: The business center of Tarkov. This is where TerraGroup was headquartered. This is where it all began.
5464e0404bdc2d2a708b4567 Description: 민간군사기업 USEC은 1999년 KerniSEC사와 Safe Sea사의 인수 합병으로 탄생하였습니다. 2004년에 국제지주회사 테라그룹이 USEC과 계약하였고, 이후 전 세계에 지부를 가지고 7500명 이상의 직원을 거느린 USEC은 사실상 테라 그룹의 사병 부대가 되었습니다.
5464e0454bdc2d06708b4567 Description: 민간 군사 기업 BEAR는 러시아 영토 내 테라그룹의 위법 행위에 대처할 목적으로 러시아 연방 정부의 기밀 법령에 의해 설립되었습니다.
5803a58524597710ca36fcb2 Description: 테라그룹(TerraGroup)은 자회사를 통해 다양한 사업에 손을 뻗친 다국적 지주회사입니다. 40개 이상의 대형 사업체를 소유하고 있으며, 전 세계 120개국 이상 국가들에 지사를 두고 있습니다.
5805f617245977100b2c1f41 Description: 본사를 영국에 둔 유한 회사로, 테라그룹의 자회사입니다. 공식적으로는 생명공학이 접목된 영농 산업 및 농업에 대한 연구를 한다고 알려져 있습니다.
5807be8924597742c603fa19 Description: 타르코프는 러시아 북서부에 위치한 도시로, 노르빈스크 지역 내의 지방 자치 단체이며 노르빈스크 특별 경제 구역의 두 주요 도시 중 하나입니다.
5807bfe124597742a92e0a4c Description: 노르빈스크 지역 내에 마련된 특구에는 노르빈스크의 도시와 타르코프 시를 포함한 주요 기반시설이 형성되어 있으며, 러시아 내 경제 자유 특구로써 법적, 경제적으로 특혜를 받고 있습니다.
5807c3f124597746bf2db2ce Description: 혼돈과 무법 속, 필수적인 의식주마저도 부족한 총체적 난국 속에서 가장 먼저 고개를 내민 수상쩍은 이들은 도덕심과 윤리 따위에 얽매이지 않거나 양심을 내려놓은 냉혹한 자들이었습니다. 그들은 무리를 이루어, 좋은 것을 독차지하기 위해 서로의 목을 물어뜯는 약육강식의 세계에서 살아갑니다. 그렇게 어제의 시민이 오늘의 스캐브가 되었습니다.
5c1b857086f77465f465faa4 Description: 소속 불명의 무장집단으로, 들리는 말에 의하면 전직 PMC 대원들과 현지인들로 구성되어 있다고 합니다. 뛰어난 전투 및 전술적 역량을 지니고 있습니다.
63a9c1f5662a5b0a2c7fbde5 Description: 타르코프는 러시아 북서부에 위치한 도시로, 노르빈스크 지역 내의 지방 자치 단체이며 노르빈스크 특별 경제 구역의 두 주요 도시 중 하나입니다.
64c0acf85174e095610734a0 Description: 셰르파는 초보자들이 게임의 주요 기능을 학습하고, 혹독한 타르코프 환경에서 살아남을 수 있도록 기술을 향상시키는 데 도움을 주는 플레이어입니다. 이 어렵고 명예로운 임무는 가장 친절하고 인내심이 많으며 경험이 풍부한 셰르파의 어깨에 달려 있습니다.
64c0ad6af99768b777048f4e Description: 특사는 타르코프 커뮤니티에 적극적으로 참여하고 배틀스테이트 게임을 지원하는 전 세계의 자원봉사자들입니다. 특사는 콘텐츠를 만들고, 커뮤니티의 모든 목소리가 반영되도록 하며, 공식 메시지를 전 세계 어디에서나 플레이어가 쉽게 이해할 수 있도록 명확하게 전달합니다.
6724cde3b1130abeee0c3db7 Description: Rumors have spread around Tarkov about a leak from the TerraGroup Laboratory. Residents affected by the substance have shown sudden changes in behavior and bouts of aggression. The number of casualties is rapidly increasing. With this new threat endangering the entire city, conflicts between the factions in Tarkov have significantly decreased. It's possible that the leaders of each side have agreed to a temporary truce.
67d135bc9e0d93daf71d555e Description: A large area of industrial park land situated adjacent to the factory zone. The area houses a customs terminal, fuel storage facilities, offices, and dorms, as well as a variety of other infrastructure and buildings.
67d13656443d3073a3a92427 Description: The industrial estate and facilities of Chemical Plant No. 16 (Polikhim) were rented out illegally to the TerraGroup corporation. During the advent of the Contract Wars, the plant became the scene of numerous firefights between BEAR and USEC that ultimately determined control over the industrial district of Tarkov.
67d1abc6c5fbfe1a95025e93 Description: The South Interchange is a key transport location for the city. This strategic area connects the port and harbor with the industrial outskirts of Tarkov. Located in the center of the interchange is a huge ULTRA shopping mall which was used as the main base of operation for the EMERCOM evacuation.
67d1ac1a2fb6a5d11b09d6f8 Description: The lighthouse at Cape Dalniy was an important strategic object on the way to Tarkov. During Contract Wars, it was the main entry point for USEC units and served as their base of operations. After the conflict, Scavs took a fancy to this place, until the old owners returned, who decided to stay in Tarkov and establish their own order.
67d1ac705df2d64de808e1d2 Description: The secret Federal State Reserve Agency base that, according to urban legends, contains enough supplies to last for years: food, medications, and other resources, enough to survive an all-out nuclear war.
67d1ac822b87c1a5a30e5ae8 Description: The business center of Tarkov. This is where TerraGroup was headquartered. This is where it all began.
67d1ac995df2d64de808e1d6 Description:
The Shoreline area makes up a large part of the outskirts of Tarkov and is located next to the Port.

The area houses a partially abandoned village, modern private housing, agricultural fields, long stretches of beach, a boating facility, gas station, weather station, and a cellular tower as well as other commercial facilities.

Shoreline's main point of interest is the Azure Coast health resort which consists of several blocks, exclusively powered by a nearby hydroelectric power plant. The resort had previously been used as temporary accommodation for members of TerraGroup and the corporation's associated divisions in preparation for the evacuation of the Tarkov Port.
67d1acbf5df2d64de808e1d8 Description: Downtown Tarkov houses banks, malls, and hotels, as well as all the other amenities a thriving metropolis could have needed.
67d1acda2fb6a5d11b09d6fd Description: The Priozersk Nature Reserve recently became part of the state-protected wildlife reserves of the North-Western Federal District.
67d1ad1b5df2d64de808e1da Description: Secret underground TerraGroup Labs facility hidden right under the center of Tarkov. Officially, this research center does not exist and, based on data scraps, is engaged in research and development as well as testing and simulation of projects in chemistry, physics, biology, and other high technology.
67e3f71e445e18765a052687 Description: A facility of one of TerraGroup's contractors, Knossos LLC. According to public sources, they build amusement and theme parks. However, this place looks more like a heavily fortified bunker than a new theme park.
67e3f72fdb783364cd0a4b63 Description: There are rumors of a maniac who calls himself the Shadow of Tagilla. Anybody can become a victim of his tortures, and no one has ever escaped from his Labyrinth. One question remains: where did the rumors come from then?
67e41856bf56c419c2861a2c Description: A facility of one of TerraGroup's contractors, Knossos LLC. According to public sources, they build amusement and theme parks. However, this place looks more like a heavily fortified bunker than a new theme park.
67e41856bf56c419c2861a30 Description: There are rumors of a maniac who calls himself the Shadow of Tagilla. Anybody can become a victim of his tortures, and no one has ever escaped from his Labyrinth. One question remains: where did the rumors come from then?
67f1acb2798033628e4c618c Description:
You passed the test mate, and I'm keeping my word. Ref's ready to meet you.
Reward: You have unlocked access to trader Ref!
67f1adea657637a74150c2ea Description:
I said I'd set you up with Jaeger, didn’t I? Everything's arranged. Now you can go talk to him.
Reward: You have unlocked access to trader Jaeger!
67f1b1f11b4b4b2dddbefabb Name: Escape from Tarkov: Arena free trial
67f1b1f11b4b4b2dddbefabb Description:
Some special people put in a good word for you. They say you're a perfect merc for the Arena. So come, test your strength with Tarkov's finest gladiators!
Reward: Access to Escape from Tarkov: Arena for 3 days!
6901f52709598eae190be134 Description: The southern port Terminal has been under Russian Armed Forces control since the beginning of the Tarkov conflict. After the city was sealed off, the terminal was fortified and became the primary evacuation point, sought by both civilian refugees and PMC units. According to unconfirmed reports, TerraGroup personnel were also evacuated through this port.
5b47891f86f7744d1b23c571 name: 잘 사는 건 죄가 아니야 - 파트 1
5c1141f386f77430ff393792 name: 잘 사는 건 죄가 아니야 - 파트 2
5d6fb2c086f77449da599c24 name: 하루에 사과 한 개가 의사를 멀리하게 해준다
67040c92bf4be8a4ef041a6c name: Darkest Hour Is Just Before Dawn
616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: All clear, you say? Good work then, soldier.
616041eb031af660100c9967 description 54c: Ah, warrior. Listen, I need some help with scouting a location - need to walk around a couple of places, check out the situation there, maybe find escape routes. Not for free - you'll get rewarded, of course. Alright, pack up, we'll be waiting for your news.
616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: 뭐라고? 거절한다고? 제발... 생각을 좀 해보게 자네가 아니라면 누가 조국을 지키겠나? 다시 한번 생각해 보게.
616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Marvelous, young man. Thank you for the work.
616041eb031af660100c9967 description 54c: Greetings, young man. My workers have to deliver several batches of valuable medicine, but I am too cautious to send them alone without making sure the path is safe. If you are available, then please help us, for the good of all civilians. You only have to scout the area and ensure a safe passage. Are you interested?
616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: 지금은 성급하게 결정을 내릴 때가 아니에요. 모든 경우의 수를 생각해서 신중하게 결정을 내려야 하지만 급한 사항이라 생각할 시간이 많진 않아요. 만약 거부한다면 다른 사람을 찾아봐야 하니 가능한 빠르게 결정해 줘요.
616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: So, how's the situation? Good, all going well then.
616041eb031af660100c9967 description 583: C'mere, mister operator, let's talk. How are you doing, lad, busy? Not busy then. I need to scout an area so that my things go smoothly. Go check it out, alright? I don’t want my men to get into any fights. So yeah, come back to me when you're done. I'll be here.
616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: 왜, 쫄았어? 니가 쫄보 새끼라는 건 진작에 알고 있었지. 좋아, 쫄보에게 걸맞은 다른 일을 찾아줄게.
616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Good, good. You've done well, mercenary. You're free to go.
616041eb031af660100c9967 description 593: Ah, mercenary, do you want to do a good deed? My clients are asking to ensure a safe area to conduct a specific secret operation. I would like to appoint you for this, as you are the most competent of the local workers. You will have to survey the area and report back to me. Good luck, mercenary.
616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: 이봐, 난 다른 일꾼을 찾을 만큼 시간이 남아돌지 않아. 정말로 날 곤란하게 만들 건가?
616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Alright, here's my map, show me what you found. Good, I'll let the clients know. Thank you, friend.
616041eb031af660100c9967 description 5a7: Mercenary, do you have a minute? I've prepared an order for the clients, but they need a guarantee that the way to the meeting spot is safe. If you aren't busy, can you find a route for them? Find a safe passage, a way to leave safely, you get me. Thank you, I’ll owe you one.
616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: 정말 유감이군. 자네에게 특별히 부탁하고 싶었던 일인데... 자네와 일을 하는 게 정말 좋아지기 시작했어. 급하게 거절하지 말고 천천히 생각해 보게, 알겠지? 아무래도 상황이 바뀔 것 같군.
616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Awesome, brother, I won’t forget this!
616041eb031af660100c9967 description 5ac: Hey there, brother, I have some stuff to deal with. There are a couple of guys with whom I really-really want to meet and discuss a couple of things, but these guys are very shy and won't get into any mess. Can you help me out with this matter? Just look around for any safe route for them so that nobody bothers them. Alright?
616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: 허 참나, 이 까탈스러운 녀석 좀 보게. "빼애앵! 이건 좋은데 저건 싫어요!". 어미 새에게 밥 달라고 애원하듯 나에게 일감을 달라고 했던 건 다 잊었나 봐? 꼴도 보기 싫으니까 꺼져!
616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Well, guess it’s time to head out then. Thank you, kid.
616041eb031af660100c9967 description 5c0: Come on in for some tea, kid. I'm preparing to go hunting today, and could use some scouting in the area. Can you go check it out? I'd be grateful.
616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: 사실, 내가 상황을 설명하는 동안 자네의 눈을 보니 이 일을 맡을지 말지 고민하고 있다는 걸 눈치챘다네. 정말 귀찮지만, 이 일을 맡아줄 다른 사람을 찾아야겠군.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: There you are! You got everything? Good stuff.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 54c: Hey there, come on in. Do you by any chance know of any magical place where you can always find whatever you need? There's an order for some supplies, and I've got no clue where to find them right now. Wanna help me out? For a reward, of course.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: 뭐라고? 거절한다고? 제발... 생각을 좀 해보게 자네가 아니라면 누가 조국을 지키겠나? 다시 한번 생각해 보게.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: You've done a good deed, mercenary.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 54c: Good afternoon, young man. In our troubling times, it's hard to remain in abundance, you have to agree. I've received an order for a batch of specific resources, but I am unable to acquire them. Will you help us, mercenary? Here is a list of all needed items.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: 지금은 성급하게 결정을 내릴 때가 아니에요. 모든 경우의 수를 생각해서 신중하게 결정을 내려야 하지만 급한 사항이라 생각할 시간이 많진 않아요. 만약 거부한다면 다른 사람을 찾아봐야 하니 가능한 빠르게 결정해 줘요.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Here's our errand boy. You've done good, mate.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 583: Hey, wanna look for some goodies? I need to find some stuff, but my lads are all busy with the more important stuff. You, however, look like you're eager to help a friend out! C'mere, I'll draw you your shopping list. Off you go then.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: 왜, 쫄았어? 니가 쫄보 새끼라는 건 진작에 알고 있었지. 좋아, 쫄보에게 걸맞은 다른 일을 찾아줄게.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Marvelous, my friend. You have our thanks.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 593: Good afternoon. I have an order for specific goods that the Blue Helmets would not be able to obtain. However, we have you, mercenary, and with your skills, it will be a breeze for you. Here is the list of the required items. Don't let me down.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: 이봐, 난 다른 일꾼을 찾을 만큼 시간이 남아돌지 않아. 정말로 날 곤란하게 만들 건가?
61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Good work, mercenary. I owe you one.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 5a7: Hello, mercenary. Listen, I've got an order for various supplies, but I don't have some of them in stock for the moment. I'd be extremely grateful if you found them for me. Here's the list, all info is in there. Thank you.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: 정말 유감이군. 자네에게 특별히 부탁하고 싶었던 일인데... 자네와 일을 하는 게 정말 좋아지기 시작했어. 급하게 거절하지 말고 천천히 생각해 보게, 알겠지? 아무래도 상황이 바뀔 것 같군.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: What a legend, always helps a brother out!
61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 5ac: Hey, brother. I've got a big full-packed list of special goods for delivery, and the clients are still waiting. Can you go look for the needed stuff to help your best bro Arshavir?
61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: 허 참나, 이 까탈스러운 녀석 좀 보게. "빼애앵! 이건 좋은데 저건 싫어요!". 어미 새에게 밥 달라고 애원하듯 나에게 일감을 달라고 했던 건 다 잊었나 봐? 꼴도 보기 싫으니까 꺼져!
61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Thank you, kid, good job. Here, that’s for the trouble.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 5c0: Hey there, kid. I'm running low on some of the supplies, some for my store, some for me. Can you help me out? Wait here, I'll make a list. Thank you.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: 사실, 내가 상황을 설명하는 동안 자네의 눈을 보니 이 일을 맡을지 말지 고민하고 있다는 걸 눈치챘다네. 정말 귀찮지만, 이 일을 맡아줄 다른 사람을 찾아야겠군.
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: You got the bastards? Good, here's your prize.
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 54c: Greetings, soldier, I have a job for you. I've got some morons who I really don't want to deal with anymore. A type of work just for you. Can you help me out? Deal with those idiots, lemme give you the list of targets.
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: 뭐라고? 거절한다고? 제발... 생각을 좀 해보게 자네가 아니라면 누가 조국을 지키겠나? 다시 한번 생각해 보게.
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: Is the job done? Good, then here is your reward.
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 54c: Mercenary, you are just in time. We need help in eliminating a group of bandits who are interfering with our humanitarian operations. If you are not busy, then I will entrust this to you. All details are included.
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: 지금은 성급하게 결정을 내릴 때가 아니에요. 모든 경우의 수를 생각해서 신중하게 결정을 내려야 하지만 급한 사항이라 생각할 시간이 많진 않아요. 만약 거부한다면 다른 사람을 찾아봐야 하니 가능한 빠르게 결정해 줘요.
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: A damn beast you are, hehe. Good work, here's your share.
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 583: Here he is, the one and only! Listen, brother, we're friends, right? And friends need to help each other out! So go help me out - I need to pop some morons, no questions asked, alright? You in?
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: 왜, 쫄았어? 니가 쫄보 새끼라는 건 진작에 알고 있었지. 좋아, 쫄보에게 걸맞은 다른 일을 찾아줄게.
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: Good work, my friend! Here’s your reward.
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 593: Mercenary, there is a task for you. The Blue Helmets will be grateful if you, so to say, strengthen our relationships. There is a list of specific people without whom our business would be much easier. Get rid of them and report to me when you're done.
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: 이봐, 난 다른 일꾼을 찾을 만큼 시간이 남아돌지 않아. 정말로 날 곤란하게 만들 건가?
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: Nice, nice. Here, take this, a little thank you gift.
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 5ac: Gotta do something... Ah, salam, brother. Listen, can you help a brother out? My boys ran into some morons and as always, there was a big mess. Many good guys died, but what’s even worse is that those assholes stole all our looted clothes! Can't leave those fuckers unpunished, right? Go and pop those bitches.
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: 허 참나, 이 까탈스러운 녀석 좀 보게. "빼애앵! 이건 좋은데 저건 싫어요!". 어미 새에게 밥 달라고 애원하듯 나에게 일감을 달라고 했던 건 다 잊었나 봐? 꼴도 보기 싫으니까 꺼져!
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: So the only thing they want is to shoot each other. That’s just wrong. Well, kid, I know you at least tried.
616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 5c0: You know, we cannot rid Tarkov of the all-destroying parasites by ourselves. But what we can do is teach them a lesson and let them realize their mistakes however inhumane they were. And if those bandits don't want to talk - then to hell is the only road for them.

Many good guys died, but what’s even worse is that those assholes stole all our looted clothes! Can't leave those fuckers unpunished, right? Go and pop those bitches.
616055d58d1c6b29be3f382b changeQuestMess: 허 참나, 이 까탈스러운 녀석 좀 보게. "빼애앵! 이건 좋은데 저건 싫어요!". 어미 새에게 밥 달라고 애원하듯 나에게 일감을 달라고 했던 건 다 잊었나 봐? 꼴도 보기 싫으니까 꺼져!
616055d58d1c6b29be3f382b successMessageT: So the only thing they want is to shoot each other. That’s just wrong. Well, kid, I know you at least tried.
616055d58d1c6b29be3f382b description 5c0: You know, we cannot rid Tarkov of the all-destroying parasites by ourselves. But what we can do is teach them a lesson and let them realize their mistakes however inhumane they were. And if those bandits don't want to talk - then to hell is the only road for them.
616055d58d1c6b29be3f382b changeQuestMess: 사실, 내가 상황을 설명하는 동안 자네의 눈을 보니 이 일을 맡을지 말지 고민하고 있다는 걸 눈치챘다네. 정말 귀찮지만, 이 일을 맡아줄 다른 사람을 찾아야겠군.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: So, how is it? Got it. Here’s your reward then.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 54c: Welcome, soldier! Can you help me out with a thing? Need to run around a place, check out the situation and escape routes. For what? Ain't you a nosy one. If I’m asking, it means I need it. The quicker you do it, the better.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: 뭐라고? 거절한다고? 제발... 생각을 좀 해보게 자네가 아니라면 누가 조국을 지키겠나? 다시 한번 생각해 보게.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: Thank you for your work. You have helped to save several lives.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 54c: Good afternoon, young man. Are you able to help us? We’re stationing several seriously injured patients, and we won’t be able to extract them with our forces alone. We have to transfer them from the city, and there they will be taken away and taken to the hospital. Come again? No, you will not have to carry them yourself. You’ll only have to scout the area, the route along which my assistants will evacuate the injured.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: 지금은 성급하게 결정을 내릴 때가 아니에요. 모든 경우의 수를 생각해서 신중하게 결정을 내려야 하지만 급한 사항이라 생각할 시간이 많진 않아요. 만약 거부한다면 다른 사람을 찾아봐야 하니 가능한 빠르게 결정해 줘요.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: Good one, what can I say.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 583: Alright, listen up, mate, straight to the point. I need you to stroll somewhere and check out if the place is safe and all that.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: 왜, 쫄았어? 니가 쫄보 새끼라는 건 진작에 알고 있었지. 좋아, 쫄보에게 걸맞은 다른 일을 찾아줄게.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: A great report, mercenary. Good work.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 593: Hello, soldier! Are you ready to help the people? Big goals start small. Please survey the marked location and find extraction points, this will help save dozens of lives.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: 이봐, 난 다른 일꾼을 찾을 만큼 시간이 남아돌지 않아. 정말로 날 곤란하게 만들 건가?
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: I’m glad you’re back. I’ve prepared something for you.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 5a7: Hello! It’s good that you’re here. I’ve ordered a bunch of spare parts for my work, they’ll be transported around here. Can you go there and check how safe the area is? I wouldn’t want to lose such cargo for nothing.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: 정말 유감이군. 자네에게 특별히 부탁하고 싶었던 일인데... 자네와 일을 하는 게 정말 좋아지기 시작했어. 급하게 거절하지 말고 천천히 생각해 보게, 알겠지? 아무래도 상황이 바뀔 것 같군.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: Perfect, brother! Here, take this, will be useful.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 5ac: Come on in, bro! How are things? I’m planning a big deal right now. But hell knows where to transport the stuff properly - the place is crawling with Scavs… Here, take a look at the map. You’ve been here recently? Check out the situation there, help a brother out, yeah?
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: 허 참나, 이 까탈스러운 녀석 좀 보게. "빼애앵! 이건 좋은데 저건 싫어요!". 어미 새에게 밥 달라고 애원하듯 나에게 일감을 달라고 했던 건 다 잊었나 봐? 꼴도 보기 싫으니까 꺼져!
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: Understood. Here, that’s for the help.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 5c0: Glad you came by. I don’t get many visitors. I myself would be covered by moss already if not for hunting. I’m packing up for one tomorrow, by the way. Can you scout the path? I’ll be going here on the map, wouldn’t want to catch a bullet. You’ve got a way clearer eyesight than me, kid. Let me know of anything you discover. Well, bless you then.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: 사실, 내가 상황을 설명하는 동안 자네의 눈을 보니 이 일을 맡을지 말지 고민하고 있다는 걸 눈치챘다네. 정말 귀찮지만, 이 일을 맡아줄 다른 사람을 찾아야겠군.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Thanks, comrade! The country won’t forget this.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 54c: Where in the bloody hell is it… It’s always like that, always run out of things just as you need them… Hey, soldier! Can you help me find something?
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: 뭐라고? 거절한다고? 제발... 생각을 좀 해보게 자네가 아니라면 누가 조국을 지키겠나? 다시 한번 생각해 보게.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Have you found it all? You have my thanks, young man.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 54c: Yes, young man, something is constantly lacking in the time of war... If there is an excess of bandages - there are not enough antibiotics, if there are antibiotics - there are not enough basic food supplies. Let me write down what we need, and perhaps if you stumble upon any of this, can take this with you for us?

6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Got it all? Lemme check. Nice, all here.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 583: Aren’t you tired of sitting on your ass in the hideout all day? Hey, ease off, I’m just messing around! We’re best mates, you and I… You just knew that I needed some help. Need to find something. Here, hold on, I’ll write a list for you so that you don’t forget it halfway.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: 왜, 쫄았어? 니가 쫄보 새끼라는 건 진작에 알고 있었지. 좋아, 쫄보에게 걸맞은 다른 일을 찾아줄게.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Hold on, I need to check the list. Yes, everything is here. You have my thanks.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 593: Mercenary, I must ask for your help. My clients require these items, but for specific reasons, I cannot officially issue an order for the search.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: 이봐, 난 다른 일꾼을 찾을 만큼 시간이 남아돌지 않아. 정말로 날 곤란하게 만들 건가?
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Thank you! I knew I could count on you.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 5a7: Hey, friend, I need your help again. I need to find some items from this list. I know that you’re a busy man, but if you do want to help me, I’d appreciate it if you did it immediately.

6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Alright, show me. Yup, all here. Nice job!
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 5ac: Hey bro, wanna help out the good guys? Here, I have an order from them. Need to find everything from the list. Nah, it’s not super urgent.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: 허 참나, 이 까탈스러운 녀석 좀 보게. "빼애앵! 이건 좋은데 저건 싫어요!". 어미 새에게 밥 달라고 애원하듯 나에게 일감을 달라고 했던 건 다 잊었나 봐? 꼴도 보기 싫으니까 꺼져!
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Did you find it? Well I’ll be damned! A damn good man you are, soldier.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 5c0: Come on in, warrior. The tea is ready. Interested in what I’m writing here, huh? It’s just a list of what I need in the household. Something of this could be useful for business too, to send to the right people. Can you help me find some of it?
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: 사실, 내가 상황을 설명하는 동안 자네의 눈을 보니 이 일을 맡을지 말지 고민하고 있다는 걸 눈치챘다네. 정말 귀찮지만, 이 일을 맡아줄 다른 사람을 찾아야겠군.

6180385770bf5a029372b9ad changeQuestMess: 뭐라고? 거절한다고? 제발... 생각을 좀 해보게 자네가 아니라면 누가 조국을 지키겠나? 다시 한번 생각해 보게.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ad successMessageT: The bandits were eliminated? You have my thanks.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ad description 54c: I need a person that is able to do hard work without unnecessary emotions. A group of people of unknown nationality constantly disrupts the supply of medicines. I’ll be frank: they kill couriers and take medicines for themselves. Mercenary, this arbitrariness must be stopped.

6180385770bf5a029372b9ad successMessageT: Get your reward then. Better than a Christmas present, hehe!

6180385770bf5a029372b9ad changeQuestMess: 이봐, 난 다른 일꾼을 찾을 만큼 시간이 남아돌지 않아. 정말로 날 곤란하게 만들 건가?

Not only did they kill my people, but now they’re going around and letting everyone know how easily they screwed Arshavir over. Those morons have to go. You can keep whatever you find on them, I’ll reward you for the job too, for real.
6180385770bf5a029372b9af changeQuestMess: 허 참나, 이 까탈스러운 녀석 좀 보게. "빼애앵! 이건 좋은데 저건 싫어요!". 어미 새에게 밥 달라고 애원하듯 나에게 일감을 달라고 했던 건 다 잊었나 봐? 꼴도 보기 싫으니까 꺼져!
6180385770bf5a029372b9af successMessageT: Oh, well. Looks like there’s no end to this scum. You didn’t get hit, at least?
6180385770bf5a029372b9af description 5c0: Was just thinking of you right now. Every time you leave me, I’m wondering if you’ll return or get killed like others. Hey, I’m not a pessimist. It’s just that there is another new gang, as people say. I’m still hoping that they are wrong. People can’t get into gangs forever, right? It has to stop eventually.
6180385770bf5a029372b9af changeQuestMess: 사실, 내가 상황을 설명하는 동안 자네의 눈을 보니 이 일을 맡을지 말지 고민하고 있다는 걸 눈치챘다네. 정말 귀찮지만, 이 일을 맡아줄 다른 사람을 찾아야겠군.
6180385770bf5a029372b9b0 description 54c: Come on in, don’t just stand in the doorway, dammit. Why am I so moody today, you ask? Well, I’ve got a rat problem… People don’t know where they shouldn’t stick their hands in. Maybe you could help me out with this? I’ll get you something in return.
6180385770bf5a029372b9b0 changeQuestMess: 뭐라고? 거절한다고? 제발... 생각을 좀 해보게 자네가 아니라면 누가 조국을 지키겠나? 다시 한번 생각해 보게.
6180385770bf5a029372b9b0 successMessageT: The bandits were eliminated? You have my thanks.
6180385770bf5a029372b9b0 description 54c: I need a person that is able to do hard work without unnecessary emotions. A group of people of unknown nationality constantly disrupts the supply of medicines. I’ll be frank: they kill couriers and take medicines for themselves. Mercenary, this arbitrariness must be stopped.
6180385770bf5a029372b9b0 changeQuestMess: 지금은 성급하게 결정을 내릴 때가 아니에요. 모든 경우의 수를 생각해서 신중하게 결정을 내려야 하지만 급한 사항이라 생각할 시간이 많진 않아요. 만약 거부한다면 다른 사람을 찾아봐야 하니 가능한 빠르게 결정해 줘요.
6180385770bf5a029372b9b0 successMessageT: Get your reward then. Better than a Christmas present, hehe!
6180385770bf5a029372b9b0 description 583: I have a matter to deal with. I’ll entrust it to you, so keep your mouth shut. Need to smoke some morons, no fuss no muss. Huh? Of course, they deserved that.
6180385770bf5a029372b9b0 changeQuestMess: 왜, 쫄았어? 니가 쫄보 새끼라는 건 진작에 알고 있었지. 좋아, 쫄보에게 걸맞은 다른 일을 찾아줄게.
6180385770bf5a029372b9b0 description 593: Are you looking for work, mercenary? There is something of your caliber. We require the elimination of several dangerous individuals known to have been participating in civilian killings. Is the task clear? And make sure to keep yourself safe - you’re a valuable employee, it would be a shame to lose you.
6180385770bf5a029372b9b0 changeQuestMess: 이봐, 난 다른 일꾼을 찾을 만큼 시간이 남아돌지 않아. 정말로 날 곤란하게 만들 건가?

67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 failMessageText: You don't want to up your skills, huh? Whatever, you'll come crawling back to me later.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 successMessageT: I knew you were ready to invest in yourself! You know the figures now, I've already arranged everything on the other side.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 description 583: I remember you liked learning from the real experts. I found a contact who can take you to the next level. But I need the cash now, and there's only one expert in the whole city, so you're gonna have to shell out.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 failMessageText: Bad decision. Many people pay serious money for this guy's services. Well, whatever, it's your loss.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 successMessageT: I knew you'd be ready! My mate's already preparing the material for you, all serious business. You're lucky you keep in touch with me.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 description 583:
You and I, we've been through some shit before. By the way, I got a mate who's been working here since the war started.

I thought maybe you'd be interested in talking to an experienced specialist like him. Not for free, of course. If you want to raise your skills, bring the dough.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 failMessageText: Won't even help your friend in need? This offer is for you only, and you don't even appreciate it. When you're in need, don't count on me.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 successMessageT:
Cool. Leave the money here, and when you go to Slavka's, please don't... Don't mention his age. He's still a kid, but he's a true prodigy! 
Ask him anything you want, from ballistics to market economics.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 description 583:
Let's get straight to the point. I'm a little tight on cash right now, so I got a special offer for you. You warm me up with a little cash, and in return, I'll set you up with one of my specialists. I'm hiding this kid from everyone because he's one of a kind. But you and me, we're tight, so I know can trust you.

But you should know, that's me being nice right now. I need the cash this week, otherwise the deal's off. My lad has enough to do even without coaching.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 failMessageText: What? I've already got a waiting line for this intel, with better offers! You don't know how much knowledge you've just missed out on.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 successMessageT:
You know what you're doing! There's already a queue for these docs, someone even offered me a higher price, but I'd rather give it to you. 

You're a trusted partner, and I know you won't use this knowledge against me.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 description 583:
Got a proposal that might be of interest to you. I've recently got my hands on some documents on advanced training for USEC officers. Such information won't help ordinary soldiers, of course, they'll get iced anyway.

But a wolf like you will definitely benefit from veteran secrets. Obviously, such proposal won't last long, so your time to think is limited.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 failMessageText: Fucking waffler. You think you know more than everybody else? Well, good fucking luck then.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 successMessageT:
I'll have to postpone some business because of this, but for a trusted friend, it's no big deal.

Two conditions: you don't pass this information on to anyone else and you don't document it in any way, you understand? If the westerners find out about the leak, it's gonna be bad news for everyone here.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 description 583:
Well, mate, how long has it been since you raised your professional skills? I had a chat with Peacekeeper, and he told me a few secrets from the experience of our "Western colleagues". I guess sometimes it's really useful to look at a situation from a different perspective.

It's obvious that you're already a warrior with experience, but this info is really valuable. If you're interested, I can share it with you. But I have a lot of work right now, so you'll have to pay for my time.

6891bb83d7502d512502d160_Note_Page1_Text: Tarkov News Issue #142 ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ Escalation in Tarkov The military conflict in Tarkov continues to escalate. Eyewitnesses remaining in the city report increasing clashes between BEAR and USEC units. UN forces and the Russian Armed Forces are cordoning off dangerous areas, but these zones are growing, and according to unconfirmed reports, high-level discussions are already underway regarding a potential full lockdown of the city. Both PMC groups likely still maintain their supply channels for weapons and personnel, which is why almost no one is willing to make optimistic forecasts. Evacuation of civilians is difficult, and both sides are organizing humanitarian aid drops to help local residents hold out until safe corridors open. Amid the crisis, local criminal groups are also becoming more active. In some cases, these groups manage to seize weapons and take control of parts of the city. Currently, three such areas are known. In the city center, the criminal gang of a former entrepreneur, known by the alias "Kaban", has established a fortified base in the former LexOs car dealership. According to recent data, PMC units have unsuccessfully attempted to dislodge the gang several times. An anonymous source told the editorial team that Kaban possesses samples of heavy weaponry that cannot even be obtained on the black market. Some experts suggest a possible connection between Kaban and the nonprofit organization "Forward Movement", which was previously linked in a high-profile case involving deputy minister of economy Yaroslav Shkurenko and the criminal authority nicknamed Chepyga. Near the customs terminal, the "Zavodskoy" gang, previously involved in petty thefts in the district, has been spotted. Eyewitnesses report ongoing gunfire in that area. EMERCOM units were forced to abandon evacuation points near the "Ultra" mall due to increased attacks by armed groups that took control of one floor of the mall. EMERCOM tents at the nearby highway interchange are no longer safe. EMERCOM recommendations remain the same: first, find a secure shelter and wait for evacuation there, provide aid to the wounded if possible, and avoid venturing onto city streets. We hope that UN forces and the Russian Armed Forces will take more decisive measures to cool the conflict in Tarkov and will continue reporting all important developments. ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ HUMANITARIAN AID POINTS BY TARKOV DISTRICTS Komsomolsky District Ordzhonikidze Ave, 3. 7:10
Before Takeoff

Pilot <u>Arsenyev</u>:
Selectors to auto. Cross-check.

7:14
Takeoff

7:43
Aircraft reached cruising altitude

Pilot <u>Belyakov</u>:
Reached cruising altitude. All systems on autopilot.

Dispatcher:
Copy that. Report when... (indistinct static)

Dispatcher:
Return to the airport.

Pilot Belyakov:
Huh, what the hell is that?..

Pilot Arsenyev:
Doesn't sound like the dispatcher.

Unknown:
Return immediately. (indistinct static)

Dispatcher:
Flight <u>RA-67996</u>, do you copy?

Pilot Belyakov:
Comms are glitching.

Pilot Belyakov:
Shit, look, someone’s typing. "Turn back to the airport…" What the fuck? Is this some kind of prank?

Pilot Arsenyev:
Some "<u>Mr. Kerman</u>"… We should contact security.

Pilot Belyakov:
This guy won’t stop, look at that! "They’re going to shoot you down. Fly lower."

(Sound of doors opening)
689b4d39987b304021088e8d_Note_Page2_Text:
<u>Passenger</u> not identified:
Sasha, Seryoga, change course fast and head back to the airport.

Pilot Arsenyev:
Huh? Did we forget someone or what?

Passenger:
Someone contacted me - they're going to shoot us down. Turn around now, damn it!

Pilot Arsenyev:
It’s not that simple!

Passenger:
I don't give a fuck! They're going to hit us! Fly lower, turn around, make an emergency landing – I don’t fucking care how!

Pilot Belyakov:
It’s just a joke! Who the fuck would do that? That's bullshit, the only thing under us is…

(Whistling of a projectile, crash, screams of flight attendants. Sounds of emergency alarms)

Pilot Arsenyev:
Hydraulics are gone!

Pilot Belyakov:
They're fucking shooting at us! Mayday! Mayday!

(Crash, screams, sounds of alarms, heavy breathing from the pilots)

689b4f338dbf3fd40f0bc778_Note_Page1_Text: Dear Kruglov Dmitry Gennadievich In your hands is a special TerraGroup emergency briefcase. Contents: Keycard; Instructions for the keycard. When an evacuation is announced via TerraGroup's internal communication channels, please remain calm and follow the instructions. ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ Procedures: 1. Take the emergency briefcase and identification documents; 2. Proceed to the evacuation point; Port of Tarkov 3. Use the personalized keycard to enter the evacuation zone; 4. Meet with TerraGroup representatives; 5. Wait for evacuation transport: ET-03 or ET-10. Your safety is our number one priority! This keycard is the property of the company. Should it be lost, you are fully liable both legally and financially. The cost of the keycard will be deducted from your paycheck. Additionally, you will lose all privileges provided by the keycard.

And remember – we are all counting on you.

Person-1
Will all my guarantees be retained? After the... you know.

Ms. A
Of course. You will keep your income in the new world, be sure of that. Everything will go as planned, as I said before. However, you will have to wait for some time until the G7 governments are fully staffed under our direction.

Person-1
Okay. I just… It's amazing to be involved in something of this magnitude.

Ms. A
Have you submitted documents for your relatives? Wife, children? Are they eligible for ER-3?

Person-1
No. The new world is for a new family. 

Ms. A
I see.
Be sure to have everything ready for your temporary successor. As per protocol TG-002, you will evacuate first, while they will take over in your absence.

Person-1
I've got it all ready.

Ms. A
See you at headquarters, then.

689b5187665c386d9c007a43_Note_Page1_Text: HIGHLY CLASSIFIED DESTROY AFTER READING Report on conducted experiments of the fuel catalyst. As part of Project #00, experiments of the 0000 000 catalyst were conducted. The tests were carried out from 000. 00, 0000 00 000. 00, 0000 by a special team consisting of: 00000000 0.0. 00000000 0.0. 0000000 0.0. 000000 0.0. 0000000000 0.0. The experiments were performed in four stages: 1) Interaction with test samples in the solid state. 2) Interaction with test samples in the liquid state. 3) Interaction with test samples in the gaseous state. 4) Assessment of effects on living organisms. Interaction with solid materials (stage 1) showed no significant deviations from storage condition behavior. When used with glass, porcelain, and light or low-melting-point metals, the catalyst did not react. Safe storage and transport in HDPE containers is confirmed.

689b52d6886e9848a4085917_Note_Page1_Text: HIGHLY CLASSIFIED DESTROY AFTER READING Purpose and characteristics Item #1156 — an aerosol augmenter of radio-frequency electromagnetic emission (RF-EMI), designed to neutralize enemy electronic equipment over a large area. The item can be used on its own or as the warhead component of delivery systems (tactical, operational-tactical, and medium range). Weight: 37.080 kg Dimensions: 2500*800*800 Effect radius: 15 to 40 km depending on medium density Activation: 1. Remote initiation using a timed/distance fuze (up to 200m) / 2. Remote initiation via radio communication (within the radio’s operational range) General design The shock-wave emitter operates by means of spherically symmetric compression of the electromagnetic field. The fuze consists of a magnetic system that directs magnetic poles to the center of a sphere formed by two intersecting magnetic flux rings. Inside the magnetic flux sphere is a detonation distributor, made from a plastic sphere with 45 channels filled with an initiating high explosive (lead azide was tested). The channel system ensures simultaneous arrival of the detonation wave at the main explosive charge. At the center of the detonation distributor is the main explosive charge (tested mixtures included trotyl-hexogen combinations, octogen, and tetryl). Embedded in the center of the main charge is a cesium iodide single crystal treated with mixture #3012. Features Using spherically symmetric compression of the electromagnetic field together with treatment of the cesium iodide single crystal with mixture #3012 provides a significant increase in pulse efficiency compared to known EMI weapon prototypes. Measurements taken during testing showed retention of 40 to 50% of the explosive energy. #: 2 Signature ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲
689b52d6886e9848a4085917_Note_Page2_Text: HIGHLY CLASSIFIED DESTROY AFTER READING Upon detonation of Item #1156 a high-frequency magnetic field is generated that establishes a standing spatial RF-EMI wave. This substantially reduces the effectiveness of EMI protection by shielding and increases the disabling effect of Item #1156. During tests a blue glow was also observed. The cause of this effect has not yet been determined. It is hypothesized that the optical phenomenon is similar in nature to ionization of gas molecules, like that which occurs during the aurora borealis. Predicted effects of deployment Use in a large city (Tarkov, Moscow, London, Singapore, etc.) will result in guaranteed power outages across the agglomeration and destruction of electrical equipment within a 15 km radius of detonation, significant damage to electrical equipment in the 15 to 28 km band, and possible damage to electrical equipment in the 28 to 40 km band. For maximum effectiveness, detonation of Item #1156 should be carried out from an elevated position (communications tower, construction crane, high-rise building, etc.). #: 2 Signature ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲
689b52ff147eeab4410ecd16_Note_Page1_Text:
<align="center"><size=20>Prepare for the Arrival, brothers
The Eye of the World watches over us
for judgment will befall everyone who
is involved in creating the New World!</size></align>
689b53222c175da5bf083ba3_Note_Page1_Text:
<width=70%>And then the Riders of the Arrival shall appear, and they shall open the door to the New World. All that is old shall die, for only the devoted flock is worthy of transformation and service to The Unheard.

The Wardens shall reap the harvest and carry into the New World the memory of old humanity. The transition to the next stage of evolution is inevitable, and the appearance of the Riders marks the beginning of the division of homo sapiens into two kinds.

They shall no longer be united: each shall be shown their place. Only those among us who follow the path laid out by The Unheard shall be permitted to witness the true flourishing of civilization.

For Their enlightenment is our salvation, and only by Their wisdom can the New World be governed.

 ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲


In the decisive hour, the Riders of the Arrival shall emerge from the shadows of corporations and states, yet they shall neither seek aid nor call followers. For we must see the great design ourselves, we must bring an end
to the old world so that from its ashes the New may be born.

Before the face of the coming, fear will compel many to submit to the will of new rulers. But the Rider cannot be deceived. The wisest judgment shall separate the wheat from the chaff, and each shall be repaid according to their deeds. The old truths have long lost their meaning. Only one truth and one purpose remain steadfast amid the ashes of dead ideas – to hasten the birth of the New World and prepare everything for the Great Arrival.</width>
689b53222c175da5bf083ba3_Note_Page3_Text:
<width=70%>Sunset and dawn, fall and uprising demand Sacrifice! Not become a Sacrifice, but become the executioner’s sword! The weak will perish, and the strong will perish! Only the truly faithful will be allowed to the Door into the future. There, where neurons and bits become one whole.

The Door, the Door, the Door divides past and future, it separates the New and the old world! By the hand of The Unheard it will open, and it will cut away all that is old, all that is needless… The will of The Unheard will determine a new order in which the human species will enter a new phase of development. Phoenix! Rebirth through blood! The new human needs fresh blood!

 ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲


Thoughts do not burn, the thoughts of Man will remain forever and the Wardens will carry thoughts through the purifying flame of true faith! The Old Man will die. The gods will die. <u>Knowledge will live</u>. Knowledge is more important than the heart! More important than blood!

The pinnacle of evolution turned out to be only a step on the path of humanity’s development, all for the sake of the truth that will be revealed to The Unheard! In the name of truth, kill. The truly faithful understand, the others will burn. The others are destined for pain. All who are not ready to be reborn will drown in the fire of pain. The final threshold. Transformation. Purification.</width>
689b53222c175da5bf083ba3_Note_Page5_Text:
<width=70%>The Priests have access to fragments of The Unheard Knowledge, for they have seen what will be. It was said that the Blue Fire will illuminate our world with a new dawn, and this will be the Dawn of the New World, and then the sacred flame of each was illuminated. The old idols, which humanity followed, lost their former power, and a new order began. The blind burn in the fire of suffering, as foretold, for they do not know the True Path. But the truly faithful turned to the Warden and were promised salvation, for the New Family awaits the New World.

 ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲


The great transition has begun, and the mighty of this world have become weak, for true power must rise to the top of the Pyramid!

Only Truth will govern the New World, and in its fire, all who cannot grasp it will be consumed. People of the old world see only suffering, but the enlightened see the path and salvation. The blind have turned away from the dawn of the New World, as foretold. They cannot comprehend the blessing of The Unheard Knowledge, and they began to fight to hide the Blue Fire from the world, so that no one would know the Arrival is near!

But they do not know that the Dawn of the New World will cross all boundaries, nor do they know that the truly faithful have seen it from everywhere and have become instruments of The Unheard, for the Arrival cannot be stopped. Where the sun rises, and where it sets, the enlightened have witnessed the great Fire.</width>
689b53222c175da5bf083ba3_Note_Page6_Text:
<width=70%>The truly faithful must follow the Path shown by The Unheard. For anyone can hasten the Arrival. The products of human thought must be gathered in special places, marked by the devoted.

The birth of the New World is preceded by the death of the old. And for this death to occur, The Unheard need instruments through which the great purification of the human race will take place.

 ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲


But the devoted themselves can become the sword that cleaves a path to the New World. By separating the truly faithful from the doomed, even now we can help The Unheard cleanse the old world. The spilled blood of the blind must become a sign from which others will awaken.

Faith is proven only through blood, pain is the touch of The Unheard, blissful and searing, for only through fire can a mortal be reborn, only with flame is the dead burned away! With Blue Fire! The flame will divide all, the flame will reveal everything, and it will reveal the New World.</width>
689b53222c175da5bf083ba3_Note_Page8_Text:
<width=70%>For those initiated into the plan, The Unheard have prepared a special and singular Path, along which the chosen will be able to enter the New World. Rebirth is ordained for our species, and every new step toward the coming future is marked by the <u>Gift</u>. Each Gift is destined to play its role.

The <u>Blue Fire</u> will become the fire that ignites the entire old world. Dry and dead, the old world must burn to ashes. States will fall, unable to resist the inevitable march of time. The power of rulers will prove to be their curse, for there is no power greater than the power of <s>The Unheard</s> wisdom, and no wisdom higher than the wisdom of The Unheard.

Yet the pinnacle of homo sapien’ history must become the foundation of the New World. All information available to humanity will be sifted through the sieve of the Wardens. Every thought and every action committed by a human will become a cast of the homo sapiens species, for nothing will escape the <u>Eye of the World</u>.

 ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲


The best that sapiens will leave behind are the pinnacles of thought, which will outlast both this species and this world. Knowledge gave rise to it, and it will also be the engine that will launch a new rebirth. But this time, living thought is destined to become one with artificial thought. True rebirth is a transformation and a merging with a more efficient <u>Higher Mind</u>.

Humanity is incapable, in the truest sense, of mastering time and space. But that which will follow homo sapiens will overcome this limitation as well, for the wisdom of The Unheard will pave the way to the <u>Door</u>, beyond which awaits the New World and the answers to all questions. BLOOD.</width>

689b53b7127673bbd40706d3_Note_Page1_Text: Lights of Tarkov Your daily source of information ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ – According to our information, Cobalt has been facing difficulties integrating into Tarkov’s energy infrastructure. Is that true? – I wouldn’t put it that way. Yes, innovation requires significant energy resources, and our facilities are no exception. Some of our projects demand power plants that simply don’t exist in the region. But the company’s development strategy already includes the construction of next-generation power stations. And we’ve made progress – just two days ago we, hm, reached an agreement with Yaroslav Grigorievich! (editor’s note: Deputy Minister of Economy Shkurenko Y. G.) In the future, Cobalt will bring light to many citizens of Tarkov, and today’s difficulties have only highlighted a problem in the city that we intend to solve. – So you see the problem as lying with the city, not the costs of your projects? Our data suggests Tarkov has never suffered from a power shortage. – Are you asking whether our projects can improve the city’s situation? That’s a great question! And I’ll say this: one of the key reasons for choosing this site was its potential for developing energy infrastructure, and in that regard, Tarkov certainly has room to grow. You have to understand – it’s not about what Tarkov looks like now, it’s about what it will become with us. – Speaking of innovation. We’ve calculated that even taken together, all of Cobalt’s public projects don’t consume that much electricity. It seems Cobalt is planning to increase the city’s power load several times over for a project the people of Tarkov know nothing about. How do you comment on that? – We understand the public’s concern and appreciate the interest in our work! But right now, even a small leak could seriously affect the development process. The walls have ears, right? Too much openness could harm not only Cobalt, but also Russia’s position on the international market. But getting back to Tarkov and its energy infrastructure – we’ve already reached a compromise with the local authorities. Until our new plants are operational, we’ll be "staying over" at state-owned facilities. For now, we’ll have to squeeze into city power plant buildings, but once our stations come online, the people of Tarkov will forget about power shortages entirely. – Well, we’re intrigued by Cobalt’s new project and look forward to hearing more. This has been Yuri Belogorov from Lights of Tarkov, and Nikolay Tretyakov, NGO Cobalt representative in Tarkov.
689b53ef987b304021088e95_Note_Page1_Text: HIGHLY CLASSIFIED DESTROY AFTER READING PURPOSE AND CHARACTERISTICS Automated Radio Relay Service (ARRS) is a system composed of multiple surveillance and communications agents, designed to prepare and control protocols Fortress, Spark, and Obelisk. The list of permitted protocols may be expanded. The ARRS system is fully autonomous and can operate without external power sources, including under protocol Twilight. If an ARRS agent is disconnected from the network, each module can continue recording for up to 2 years and retain stored data for up to 10 years. The system supports expansion with additional ARRS modules and automatic updates. Each ARRS module is equipped with a unique security system (MOU-73S) capable of completely locking the module. Access to a module is possible only with a unique identifier embedded in the senior operator’s key. GENERAL DESIGN The ARRS system has no single control center. Each ARRS module locally stores the following data: 1) Scripts required for the module’s autonomous operation 2) Scripts for verifying user access level and transmitting data according to protocol The Eye (HGL-01E) 3) Archive of recordings for the entire observation history 4) Scripts to initiate protocol Warden (JKL-13R) Module preparation and assembly are carried out according to the instructions described in Appendix 17 (TUR-09L). ARRS modules operate on a closed infrastructure. The model, methods, and architectural requirements are described in Appendix 21 (UTE-99Y). #: 2 Signature ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲

68d2f400be7c1493b90cd3f7_Note_Page1_Text: #14 Newspaper THE NINTH CIRCLE ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ The Will of Chance Greetings to all survivors. I don’t know what I’d do without being able to talk to you. Sometimes it even feels like the old world never existed, as if everything collapsed into this closed-off city where each of us has just one mission – to make it through to tomorrow. But today, I want to share a story that gives me hope for a better outcome. Maybe it will help you too. Yesterday I went to check on a wounded friend and met a gloomy, withdrawn BEAR sitting in Therapist’s recovery room, clutching a USEC patch in his hands. At first glance, it seemed obvious: a trophy from a heavy fight where he lost a comrade. He’d avenged him, sure, but that hadn’t brought him peace. So there he sat, angry at himself for not being able to double-tap that USEC in time. Still, I decided to strike up a conversation, and from his first words, I realized all my guesses were wrong. This BEAR had been scouting a new route to TerraGroup’s underground lab when his squad discovered an elevator shaft in critical condition. They managed to reach the complex through it and complete their mission, but on the way back, Raiders pinned them down hard. During the retreat, the shaft collapsed, burying the entire team except for our guy. He himself was pinned against a wall by a support beam. The surface was just a couple hundred meters away, but without help, he had no chance of making it out alive. So he decided to hold on as long as he could. Two days later, he heard footsteps approaching. He recognized English speech, but by then he couldn’t even hold his pistol, let alone put up a fight. He saw a flashlight beam sweep the tunnel ahead and braced himself for the end. But instead of a gunshot, he heard a safety click, followed by careful steps. The newcomer wasn’t an enemy, but an ally. The stranger helped him get free, but the effort triggered heavy bleeding that his exhausted body couldn’t handle. What happened next he remembers only in fragments, drifting in and out of consciousness. All his strength went into holding onto that USEC, and at some point, he accidentally tore the patch off the stranger’s shoulder. He woke up in Therapist’s care, never finding out who had pulled him from the rubble. All he had left was the patch, which he now keeps with him. We often convince ourselves that we’re in control, but most things around us are shaped by forces we can’t predict – a lucky weather break during retreat, a weapon jam in the enemy’s hands, or the will of a random passerby. To everyone reading this: I wish you hope for a better outcome, even when everything seems set against you. That’s all for now. Stay alive till tomorrow.
68d2f44df63f06b7590ce30e_Note_Page1_Text: #19 Newspaper THE NINTH CIRCLE ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ Down the Untrodden Paths I welcome my readers once again. The Contract Wars have forever changed Tarkov’s landscape, and knowing the terrain often means the difference between life and death. Many turn to Jaeger for help, but the forester’s experience is of little use in urban areas or on the outskirts. Some of you may have heard of the Mushroom Picker who roams across the city, though few have ever met him in person. At one point, both the military and the Scavs were hunting the reclusive old man. It’s said the Mushroom Picker has no ties to TerraGroup and has never even held a weapon. Still, many would pay a fortune to have him on their side. That’s because the old man knows routes and passages that no one has walked, even in peaceful times. Somehow, the Mushroom Picker manages to avoid army checkpoints, not to mention Scav camps. With knowledge like that, he can seriously affect the balance of power in Tarkov. Yet no one has ever truly understood his motives or goals. The more devout citizens like to tell stories of his night-time encounters with witnesses of the Arrival. To be honest, I don’t rule anything out anymore. Despite his murky nature, the Mushroom Picker sometimes appears to those who’ve lost their way. I personally know several people, and they share nothing in common: he’s helped mercenaries from both PMCs, civilians, and even Scavs. Whatever moral compass guides this eccentric wanderer, his help is not something one can count on. A meeting with the Mushroom Picker only happens when he wills it. That’s all for now. Stay alive till tomorrow.

<space=2em>While I was waiting, I decided to check the phone with the recording. It only powers on every now and then, but I managed to copy the conversation onto an audio tape for safety. I don’t have much time, sooner or later they’ll find me!

<space=2em>Please, come for the recording as soon as you can, and help me get out of the city! We <u>had a deal</u>!</width>
68d2f6352ca1a737d107b84b_Note_Page1_Text: TARKOV HERALDInvestigations ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ THE MAYOR VISHNEVSKY CONNECTIONS EXPOSED A new investigation by journalist Anastasia Mikhailova is set to be released, and she claims to possess irrefutable evidence. Evidence so strong it cannot be ignored in court, which means certain figures in the government might soon have to say goodbye to their personal drivers and immunity status! An investigation of this scale could shake the city to its core, forcing Yaroslav Shkurenko (Deputy Minister of Economics of the Norvinsk Region and head of the NPO “Forward Movement”) and Dmitry Vishnevsky (Mayor of Tarkov) to face legal charges alleging direct ties between government officials and the local crime authority Arseny Chepygin. Mikhailova’s announcement has sparked intense public debate, and our team has conducted several polls among local residents. Many praise the journalist’s courage while expressing concern for her safety following such serious accusations. If government officials are truly connected to criminal networks, what’s to stop them from silencing a troublesome reporter? Despite the risks, Anastasia has stated that she intends to continue her investigation and has already confirmed the existence of a key witness whose testimony may serve as crucial proof supporting her claims. Over the years, Anastasia Mikhailova has built a reputation as a journalist willing to risk everything in pursuit of the truth. We will continue following the story and report on any new developments related to the ongoing investigation.

68d2fc914aae290cf704e373_Note_Page1_Text:
<width=75%>Hello!

I already sent several emails but haven’t received a reply. Looks like the internet is down too. From now on I will duplicate all information on paper. I have a courier acquaintance here, his name is Pasha.

You asked how it all happened. I was at the gas station during their meeting and managed to record everything on my phone, but they spotted me. They didn’t <s>lea</s> let me leave. They tried to find out how I knew about the meeting and beat me severely. The phone was smashed on purpose. They said "so you don’t sniff around anymore". But now I will see it through to the end so everyone learns about those bastards.

When I returned home, I checked the phone and realized some files could still be recovered. The audio track survived, so we still have a chance. Shkurenko's actions need to be <u>brought to </u> <s>lie</s> <u>light</u>, and if Vishnevsky is involved in all this as well, then the matter is very serious.

I can’t entrust the recording to anyone, not even Pasha, so I can only hand it over in person. We need to meet as soon as possible because the threats have increased, and even Pasha has started to be pressured.

Because of technical problems Pasha had to switch to a bicycle, so it’s now very easy to stop him. I need guarantees of safety, but first we must evacuate Pasha’s family. The guy risks even more than I do, and yet he keeps helping our cause. I’m eagerly awaiting your reply, which you can pass through Pasha.</width>
68d2fd018c12620073059934_Note_Page1_Text:
<width=75%>Hello!

I already sent a letter to your home address but received no reply. Now I have a recording that proves everything we talked about! The recording didn’t survive in full, but it’s definitely enough for your investigation.

Pasha’s been getting stopped more often, they search him and check everything he’s carrying. So I can only hand over the recording in person to avoid any risk. I’ve already started receiving threats from someone and plan to hide out of town. There’s a place. <u>It</u> Pasha will help you find it. I’ll be waiting for you there to hand over the recording.</width>

Approx. 18:00
Watch stopped working when we approached Item 1156. Two teams continued searching for personnel inside the facility, navigation is extremely difficult. While pursuing the staff, we heard screams. Too many voices. Far more than just the personnel. Ordered regrouping. Preparing defenses near Item 1156 and waiting for the rest of the team.</width>

68d2fdbbf8817df4690db3d5_Note_Page1_Text: 000000 00ASSIFIED DESTROY AFTER READING 000000000 period: 000. 00, 0000 - Mar. 7, 2000 Research goals: 0000000 000 000000000000 00 00000 0000000000000 000000000000 0sing experimental compounds. During the reporting period 14 groups of test subjects were examined at the site. Each group contained between 5 and 25 people depending on the experimental conditions. Some experiments could not be carried out due to the site’s limited capabilities. Group 9 was redirected to Site Theta because of the risk of contamination and the poor containment of the “Labyrinth” premises. Group 1 had to be neutralized entirely for similar reasons. However, most experiments proved effective and provided the material and conclusions required by the laboratories and other test sites. Studies were conducted on effects on the human body and on expanding physical capabilities. Work proceeded along three directions: 1) Increasing organism endurance under various conditions. 2) Testing the effects of experimental biological compounds on the human body. 3) Developing compounds capable of affecting the human mental state. Increasing organism endurance under various conditions. During the study, subjects were placed in various conditions (food deprivation, prolonged confinement in a restricted space, blood loss exceeding 20/30/40% of total blood volume, burns with ITP from 50 to 95 points, acute and subacute intoxication). Compounds SJ6, eTG-c, and SJ1 demonstrated significant effectiveness in stabilizing condition and activating the organism’s reserve resources in poisoning of varying severity and intoxication in the presence of open wounds. Compounds SJ15 and M.U.L.E. demonstrated high effectiveness under favorable conditions and increased subjects’ activity periods by 47–60%. As a result of the studies, eTG-c, SJ6, and SJ15 are recommended for further iteration and development. The lack of professional training among test subjects negatively affected research results, therefore when used on trained combat personnel, the projected effect may reach higher results. Field testing is required.
68d2fdbbf8817df4690db3d5_Note_Page2_Text: HIGHLY CLASSIFIED DESTROY AFTER READING Testing the effects of experimental biological compounds on the human body. Extensive testing of already developed combat stimulants was carried out according to the established plan. Compounds P22 and M.U.L.E. exhibited critical side effects with regular use. Subjects were diagnosed with muscle tissue atrophy and, in isolated cases, paralysis or necrosis of individual muscles (3% of subjects). The research group associates these effects with excessive wear of muscle tissue and the organism’s inability to recover after such pressure. It is recommended to develop an advanced version of these compounds in which, after administration of the functional composition, a restorative mixture is also administered to replace expended physiological resources. Development of a new formulation of the compound Zagustin continues. Formulations that thinned the blood immediately after the action of the primary mixture were tested, but subjects exhibited symptoms similar to hemophilia. None of these subjects had a genetic predisposition to hemophilia, therefore the search for a more suitable formulation continues. In parallel a Zagustin-based compound with reduced effect on profibrinolysin activators is being developed. At present, Zagustin use is NOT RECOMMENDED due to an increased risk of thrombosis and stroke in the majority of subjects. Developing compounds capable of affecting the human mental state. The study did not confirm the possibility of deliberately inducing specific psychoses in subjects. Genetics and personal experience of subjects determined individual risk factors that limit the influence of specific compounds. Therefore a proposal emerged to develop, instead of receptor-targeted action, a compound that can influence the target’s central nervous system and cause the development of the psychoses to which the target has the greatest predisposition. Under the supervision of Voronenko N. V., two iterations of a general-purpose compound were tested. At present there is a problem with stabilizing the compound, and tests confirmed subject resistance to the compound. Deeper genomic study of subjects is required to identify
68d2fdbbf8817df4690db3d5_Note_Page3_Text: HIGHLY CLASSIFIED DESTROY AFTER READING the “protection gene” and to develop a more effective compound formulation. In accordance with Protocol #13, the Labyrinth site staff await written confirmation or edits on each research direction. Senior staff member Voronenko N. V.
